channel.title: Compatibility issues?
channel.description:
OK, a quick summary of my issue before I give all the information. I just bought a Hanns G 21.5 Widescreen HDMI LCD off of newegg the other day. Shipped here, and set it up for my Xbox 360. Which all was fine and great, until now when I decide to hook it up to my Desktop.
It does display the desktop, but I'm having resolution, font rendering, wallpaper, etc issues. The last one isn't an issue I just need some understanding with it. OK so, now on to the info.
[ul][*][URL=http://support.dell.com/support/edocs/systems/dim2350/specs.htm#1101572]Dell Dimension 2350[/URL] [*][URL=http://"http://www1.sapphiretech.com/en/products/graphics_overview.php?gpid=59"]Sapphire Radeon 9250 256MB GFX[/URL] [*][URL=http://www.newegg.com/Product/Product.aspx?Item=N82E16824254039]21.5in Hanns G HDMI Widescreen LCD[/URL] [*][URL=http://www.maginnovision.com/Products/Product.aspx?sn=465&pi=1459]17in MAG Innovision LCD[/URL][/ul]
So my issue is the resolution on the new widescreen. There are no 16:9 resolutions, the max is like 1440x900, which isn't near the max on the LCD(1920x1080), and doesn't look good at all. The LCD came with some install disc, but because I don't use windows I didn't pay much attention to it. I assumed really that it would just be plug and play.
I also thought that it might be because my gfx card is so old. That maybe it can't support that size resolution. I really would like to see my Linux install in full living color.

item.title: Compatibility issues?
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

Drivers/not typing monitor correctly/Old video card.

Read full topic

item.title: Compatibility issues?
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

[quote=“chrisn2323, post:2, topic:295085”]computer LCD’s are usually 16:10, i dunno why you’d want 16:9

yes your video card doesnt support high enough resolutions[/quote]

yeah I meant 16:10.

EDIT: Can I get confirmation from anyone else, if it is in fact my graphics card being old as the culprit.

Read full topic

item.title: Compatibility issues?

item.title: Compatibility issues?
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

OK, a quick summary of my issue before I give all the information. I just bought a Hanns G 21.5 Widescreen HDMI LCD off of newegg the other day. Shipped here, and set it up for my Xbox 360. Which all was fine and great, until now when I decide to hook it up to my Desktop.

It does display the desktop, but I’m having resolution, font rendering, wallpaper, etc issues. The last one isn’t an issue I just need some understanding with it. OK so, now on to the info.

[ul][]Dell Dimension 2350
[]Sapphire Radeon 9250 256MB GFX
[]21.5in Hanns G HDMI Widescreen LCD
[]17in MAG Innovision LCD[/ul]

So my issue is the resolution on the new widescreen. There are no 16:9 resolutions, the max is like 1440x900, which isn’t near the max on the LCD(1920x1080), and doesn’t look good at all. The LCD came with some install disc, but because I don’t use windows I didn’t pay much attention to it. I assumed really that it would just be plug and play.

I also thought that it might be because my gfx card is so old. That maybe it can’t support that size resolution. I really would like to see my Linux install in full living color.

Read full topic
